Classes in com.flipkart.lois.channel.impl that implement ReceiveChannel
 class BufferedChannel<T>
          A Bufferred Channel that can contain "buffer size" messages before it blocks on send.
 class BufferedPassByRefChannel<T>
          A buffered channel that passes an object by reference.
 class SimpleChannel<T>
          A simple non buffered channel with a capacity form one message only.
 class SimplePassByRefChannel<T>
          A simple channel that can accomodate only one message at a time, This channel passes by reference, so it should be used to only pass immutable messages.
